document.full_text: novak djokovic equaled ivan lendl's 29-match winning start by beating guillermo garcia-lopez 6-1, 6-2 thursday at the madrid open.
document.title: djokovic wins 29th in a row in 2011 to match lendl's mark
lines_and_colors: novak djokovic equaled ivan lendl's 29-match winning start by beating guillermo garcia-lopez 6-1, 6-2 thursday at the madrid open.
